meanings.definition: A musician who plays the cornet.
meanings.sent1: The talented cornetist performed a beautiful melody at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The cornetist played a lively tune that got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent3: The cornetist accidentally played a funny note that made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The cornetist's music soared like a bird flying high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The young cornetist's passion for music shone brightly during the performance.

meanings.definition: One who is skilled in playing the cornet.
meanings.sent1: The experienced cornetist effortlessly hit all the high notes.
meanings.sent2: The talented cornetist practiced diligently to perfect their technique.
meanings.sent3: The cornetist skillfully juggled playing the cornet and singing at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The cornetist's fingers moved like lightning on the keys, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent5: The skilled cornetist's performance was a masterpiece of musical artistry.
